```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
ggplot(pH_kalauhaihai_OctNov2022, aes(date_time, pH)) +
  geom_line()
```

```{r}
kanewai_spring_conductivity_plot <- ggplot(data = conductivity_kanewai_spring_rock_feb_apr_2023, aes(x = date_time, 
                                                      y = high_range_microSiemens)) + 
  geom_line() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "High Range microSiemens (uS/cm)",
       x = "Date & Time",
       y = "High range microSiemens (uS/cm)")
  

kanewai_spring_conductivity_plot
```
